page.title: 16ENTERTAINMENT IN SKEGNESS
page.content: Mr.Leslie Shepherd is the Foreshore and Entertainments manager and so looks after the Embassy Centre which is the largest centre in Skegness.It has a stage and an auditorium.It holds shows and concerts.Bottons Fairground is an outdoor facility for all the family to enjoy.There are kiddies rides and rides for adults too. There are many exiting things for children and adults to do on the beach.. donkey rides for children and trampoline games.Adults can swim in the sea.There are lots of amusement machine arcades in Skegness.People like gambling money on them. There is a big outdoor swimming pool behind the Embassy.This is popular in summer but closes down for the winter.There are also firework displays,putting greens,golf courses and bowling greens.Skegness hosts the worlds largest bowling tournament.
